operations.name: Paint
operations.brief: Flushing pending UI changes to the screen.

operations.name: Navigation
operations.brief: Updating the current UI via a URL change without a full reload.

operations.name: Pageload
operations.brief: Loading a new web page via a URL change with a full reload.

operations.name: DNS
operations.brief: Connecting to a DNS server to resolve a domain name.

operations.name: TLS
operations.brief: Establishing a secure connection via a cryptographic handshake.
